import React from 'react'; import {useState} from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Page from './utilities/Page'; import UTextInput from './utilities/UTextInput'; import USelectDropdown from './utilities/USelectDropdown'; import UButton from './utilities/UButton'; import UTextArea from './utilities/UTextArea'; import ImageUpload from './ImageUpload'; import './../style/CreateJobStyle.css'; export default () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [images, setImages] = useState([]); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); let getImages = (e) => { if (e) { let list = []; let files = e.target.files; for (let i = 0; i < files.length; i++) { let url = URL.createObjectURL(files[i]); list.push(url); } setImages(list); } }; return ( {}} placeholder='Model Name'>
